metadata.title: CVE-2023-3106 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference vulnerability was found in netlink_dump. Thisissue can occur when the Netlink socket receives the message(sendmsg) forthe XFRM_MSG_GETSA, XFRM_MSG_GETPOLICY type message, and the DUMP flag isset and can cause a denial of service or possibly another unspecifiedimpact. Due to the nature of the flaw, privilege escalation cannot be fullyruled out, although it is unlikely.
